Contact information for Accessible Learning Services and Welcome Desks at George Brown College:

1. ALSregister@georgebrown.ca (for questions regarding registration with Accessible Learning Services)
2. 200 King St. East, room 582C, Phone: 416-415-5000 ext. 2622, Email: letstalk@georgebrown.ca (for general inquiries and booking appointments)
3. 160 Kendal Avenue, room C317, Phone: 416-415-5000 ext. 4585, Email: letstalkcl@georgebrown.ca
4. Daphne Cockwell Centre for Health Sciences, 51 Dockside Drive, room 225, Phone: 416-415-5000 ext. 5370, Email: letstalkwf@georgebrown.ca
5. 99 Gerrard Street East, Room SHE597, Phone: 416-415-5000 ext. 2621, Email: letstalk@georgebrown.ca
6. 200 King St. East, Room 173 B-A, Phone: 416-415-5000 ext. 4654, Phone (toll-free): 1-800-265-2002, Email: dhhs@georgebrown.ca

Additional contact information:
TTY: 1-877-515-5559
Email: ask.george@georgebrown.ca
Social Media Hub (two instances)
